DOC.brief_summary: Observational comparison study of three commercially available regional oxygen saturation devices on a wide range of skin colors.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Normal Readings and Repeatability Across Skin Colors
DOC.criteria: Male or Female of any race or ethnicity greater than eighteen years of age weighs greater than or equal to 40 kilograms is not currently admitted to the hospital is not known to be pregnant understands English is willing and able to provide informed consent and comply with study procedures is less than eighteen years of age weighs less than 40 kilograms if known to be pregnant is a current patient in the hospital does not understand English has known anemia is unwilling and able to provide informed consent and comply with study procedures
